img_text: 17:30 Thread Lisa Hancox @LisaMHancox 06/08/2018 This @greenandblacks Velvet Fruit Raspberry product has 1% raspberry puree and 25% apple purée & juice. All I taste is apple. Wasn't expecting a raspberry in the middle but seriously, 1%? So wish I hadn't wasted the ££ #ripoff #foodie GREEN &BLACK'S VELVET FRUIT 91 Lisa Hancox @LisaMHancox Keen to hear your response @greenandblacks as to why you feel you can call this item Raspberrt and not Apple. A refund would be appreciated as a start please.. . #badmarketing Tweet your reply
